name: Grazie Professional
description:
Enhances the base Grazie plugin with advanced writing assistance for English text in your IDE. Grazie Professional is a result of the latest developments in deep learning and natural language processing.

  • Suggests words, phrases, and whole sentences as you type.
  • Checks spelling and grammar, taking into account syntax, semantics, and context.
  • Supports standard style guides, like those by Google or Microsoft. Lets you create project-specific style guides with custom rules.

For the full list of features, please see the documentation.

Data privacy: by default, we process your data locally.
Coming soon: opt-in remote processing with more features and better quality.
notes: • Fixed a lot of grammar error false positives
